attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To enforce equal treatment by all Police Forces, when practising PACE 1987.  There is too much Racism practised by WHITE Police Officers when dealing with Black &  Ethnic People especially in the Southwest, also the CPS and the Courts (all). The proof of this is in the report regarding PACE results.
 "WE ARE ALL EQUAL BUT WE ARE ALL DIFFERENT."
